dataList.dlg: Hello... I've been told that this is...where I'll stir with entertainment.
A fresh morning. Let's kick off today with an energetic start.
It's a lazy afternoon... When I'm feeling drowsy, I shake the instruments in my hands to a rhythm. Like this, and that.
The favorite time of the dead... When do you go to sleep, Dante?
Oh... You wanna hear my music? Hmm... I'll play a song if you insist.
In a fight, you should keep your head empty. It's all about the rhythm. Stay lively, but without missing a beat.
What do you do when your mind is disturbed? How about learning to play music with me? It helped me a lot.
I wasn't always like this. One day, I chanced upon music and dancing... Those opened a window into my own psyche.
I know of a way to shake off agony, fear, anxiety, and all that weighs you down. Just surrender you body to the rhythm, and it'll lead you.
...Did you not like my performance?
I'll repay you with merrier music.
Let's shake it.
Is this the right choice...?
What's up, Dante...?
I'll break your head.
I'll get your head next.
Unk!
Too easy.
Who will be next...?
That was easier than I thought.
Not what I wished for...
I was just about to feel some enthusiasm... It's over already.
Today's performance was satisfying. It entertained me to no end.
We can try another time. Nothing says we can't give it a shake again.
